channel.title: Comments on: Fine Art Portrait: 6 Tips to Create Your Own

item.title: By: Erik Maurer
item.dc:creator: Erik Maurer
item.description: As important as facial expressions are, they don’t have to be featured in a portrait.
item.content:encoded: As important as facial expressions are, they don’t have to be featured in a portrait.

item.title: By: Byron Banks
item.dc:creator: Byron Banks
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://vigneshkannan52.github.io/pixetty/2022/03/27/post-1/#comment-2">Stacy Palmer</a>.
It also has patterns that you can use to create your own fine art.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Stacy Palmer.

It also has patterns that you can use to create your own fine art.

item.title: By: Stacy Palmer
item.dc:creator: Stacy Palmer
item.description: Some of these include poses, expressions, and lighting that will add an elegant touch to your portraits.
item.content:encoded: Some of these include poses, expressions, and lighting that will add an elegant touch to your portraits.
